title: Why Choose India for Medical Treatment?
subtitle: World-class healthcare at affordable prices
heading: Why Choose India for Medical Treatment?
intro: India has emerged as a leading destination for medical tourism, offering world-class healthcare at affordable prices.

benefits.worldClassDesc: JCI-accredited hospitals with state-of-the-art medical facilities and technology.
benefits.affordableDesc: Significantly lower costs compared to Western countries without compromising quality.
benefits.expertsDesc: Internationally trained and experienced medical professionals.
benefits.noWaitingDesc: Immediate access to treatment without long waiting periods.
benefits.multilingualDesc: Support in multiple languages for international patients.
benefits.travelDesc: Simplified visa process and travel arrangements for medical tourists.
